statements: SELECT * FROM email_sequences;
SELECT email_content, sequence_id FROM email_sequences ORDER BY send_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sequence_id, send_timestamp, email_content FROM email_sequences WHERE sequence_id = '1234';
SELECT sequence_id, email_content FROM email_sequences WHERE send_timestamp > '2022-09-01' ORDER BY send_timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(send_timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM email_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, email_content, send_timestamp FROM email_sequences WHERE sequence_id = '123456'
SELECT * FROM email_sequences WHERE send_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY send_timestamp DESC
SELECT email_content FROM email_sequences WHERE email_content LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM email_sequences ORDER BY email_content ASC, send_timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sequence_id FROM email_sequences
SELECT * FROM emails;
SELECT id, email_address, scheduled_time FROM emails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email_address, email_subject FROM emails WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM emails ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT email_address, email_subject, scheduled_time FROM emails WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM emails WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT email_address, email_subject FROM emails WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT emails.id, emails.email_address, email_logs.sent_time FROM emails INNER JOIN email_logs ON emails.id = email_logs.email_id WHERE emails.id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS email_count FROM emails WHERE scheduled_time <= NOW();
SELECT emails.email_address, email_logs.sent_time FROM emails LEFT JOIN email_logs ON emails.id = email_logs.email_id;
SELECT * FROM EmailSequences;
SELECT sequence_name FROM EmailSequences ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentEmails WHERE recipient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name FROM EmailSequences WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, sent_time FROM SentEmails ORDER BY sent_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmailSequences WHERE sequence_name = 'Welcome Email Sequence';
SELECT * FROM Recipients WHERE timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name FROM EmailSequences ORDER BY sequence_name DESC;
SELECT email_address FROM Recipients WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM SentEmails WHERE sent_time >= '2022-01-01' AND sent_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT sequence_id, email_address, schedule_timestamp FROM email_sequences;
SELECT email_id, sequence_id, email_content, send_timestamp, sent FROM scheduled_emails;
SELECT log_id, email_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM email_logs;
SELECT recipient_id, email_id, recipient_email FROM email_recipients;
SELECT * FROM email_sequences;
SELECT * FROM email_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT email_address, schedule_timestamp FROM email_sequences WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT email_content, send_timestamp FROM scheduled_emails WHERE sent = TRUE AND send_timestamp > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY send_timestamp ASC;
SELECT el.log_id, el.log_timestamp, el.log_message, er.recipient_email FROM email_logs el JOIN email_recipients er ON el.email_id = er.email_id;

SELECT es.sequence_id, COUNT(se.email_id) AS total_emails FROM email_sequences es LEFT JOIN scheduled_emails se ON es.sequence_id = se.sequence_id GROUP BY es.sequence_id HAVING COUNT(se.email_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM EmailSequences;
SELECT sequence_id, recipient_email FROM EmailSequences ORDER BY send_timestamp DESC;
SELECT email_id, sequence_id, sent_timestamp FROM ScheduledEmails WHERE recipient_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT template_id, template_name, template_content FROM EmailTemplates LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM RecurringEmails WHERE start_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EmailSequences WHERE recipient_email='example@email.com' ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT email_id, email_content FROM EmailSequences WHERE sequence_id IN (SELECT sequence_id FROM ScheduledEmails) ORDER BY send_timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_message FROM EmailLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM EmailTemplates WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(template_content) > 100 ORDER BY template_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecurringEmails WHERE recipient_email='another@example.com' AND start_timestamp < '2022-12-31' AND end_timestamp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
